long_description: This junior-size Novara bike jersey boasts an active fit and performance features just like Mom and Dad's, along with UPF protection and fun fade colors that boys are sure to enjoy. Polyester's smooth inner surface absorbs and pushes moisture to the breathable, open texture of the outer surface for rapid evaporation. Soft polyester with a touch of spandex provides excellent resistance to pilling and snagging. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Reflective logos enhance visibility when cycling in low light. 3 elasticized rear pockets expand to store a few snacks and bike essentials.
